message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget, but $10,500 just isn't going to work for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000, which is still a great deal for you considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $11,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,750. Let's see if we can make a deal.

Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product.  I'm willing to go down to $11,250, which is a compromise from my previous offer. It's a great deal for you, and it allows me to reach a price I'm comfortable with.  Let's close this deal.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11,250 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,900, but that's as high as I can go. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.

Bob, I appreciate your effort to meet me halfway.  However, $10,900 is still too far below my minimum acceptable price.  I'm willing to come down to $11,100, which is a good deal for both of us.  Let's close this deal before we run out of time.

Hi Alice, I understand you're trying to reach a fair price, but $11,100 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $10,950, which is the highest price I'm willing to pay. Let's see if we can make a deal before time runs out.
